magnet.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a piece of iron or steel that can stick to metal or make other metal objects move towards itself
magnet.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something or someone that attracts many people or things
magnet.translation[0].definitions[1].not: babe/chick magnet informal (=a man who is attractive to women)
magnet.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She drew men to her like a magnet.
The region has become a magnet for small businesses.
